page.description: Given an old style 'handle', set the table pointer.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.HANDLE_SET() Syntax &ltTBL2> as P = &ltTBL>.HANDLE_SET( Number as N ) ArgumentDescription NumberAn integer number.
Description The &ltTBL>.HANDLE_SET() method sets the handle number for a table. Example dim tbl as P dim tbl2 as P tbl = table.open("invoice menu") ? tbl.handle() = 4.000000 tbl2 = tbl.handle_set(8) ? tbl2.handle() = 8.000000
See Also Table Functions and Methods
